Row.Text: I have fought and survived against the King of Heroes and the incarnation of evil itself. You have no chance of winning this little skirmish of yours.
I have fought against legendary heroes and many countries to reach where I am today. Compared to my previous foes, you shall be a mere fly.
Then so be it. The blood of your soldiers shall stain the grasses of the British countryside for as far as the eye can see.
I have fought and survived against the King of Heroes and the incarnation of evil itself. You have no chance of winning this little skirmish of yours.
I have fought against legendary heroes and many countries to reach where I am today. Compared to my previous foes, you shall be a mere fly.
Then so be it. The blood of your soldiers shall stain the grasses of the British countryside for as far as the eye can see.
We lack your army's numbers, but you lack in conviction. My subjects place their utmost faith in me, and it is through that faith I will achieve victory.
You are even more foolish than I thought. You may as well attack a mountain. But very well, then, if you wish to die in a hopeless battle, then I will not stop you.
We lack your army's numbers, but you lack in conviction. My subjects place their utmost faith in me, and it is through that faith I will achieve victory.
You are even more foolish than I thought. You may as well attack a mountain. But very well, then, if you wish to die in a hopeless battle, then I will not stop you.
The people of Britain have charged me with the task of destroying you. As their king, I am more than willing to oblige.
A man without fear cannot be wise. When you see the shining steel of my army's swords rise from the horizon, we will both find out how wise you are.
A man without fear cannot be wise. When you see the shining steel of my army's swords rise from the horizon, we will both find out how wise you are.
The people of Britain have charged me with the task of destroying you. As their king, I am more than willing to oblige.

A betrayal like this is against my code of honour. However, I have no other choice. You are too much of a potential threat to leave alone, and the safety and prosperity of the people of Britain are more of my concern than honour.

A betrayal like this is against my code of honour. However, I have no other choice. You are too much of a potential threat to leave alone, and the safety and prosperity of the people of Britain are more of my concern than honour.
My goal is to bring the honour and glory of Britain to the entire world, be it through speech or through force. Stand aside, lest you lose your life defending your country and its inferior culture!
My goal is to bring the honour and glory of Britain to the entire world, be it through speech or through force. Stand aside, lest you lose your life defending your country and its inferior culture!
It is too much to ask for your forgiveness...the people of Britain...Lancelot...the rest of the Knights...Shirou...I can only say that I am sorry I could not be the king I needed to be.
With this defeat, my fate has been ascertained. I was a ruler unworthy of my country. Perhaps now, the only place left for me is in Avalon, where I may sleep for eternity.
In the end, even in this world, even with this miracle of a second chance, Britain now lies in ruins...I am a disgrace to the throne, and to all of my people...
Hail, stranger. You stand before Pendragon, rightwise king born of all England. It is my hope that you do not come to my court as an enemy.
Well met, leader. I am the King born of Caliburn, Arthur Pendragon. Britain's strength is immeasurable, so think carefully when I ask of you: are you my ally, or are you my enemy?
For you, my trusted ally, I will allow you have a seat directly at the Round Table. Now, what did you want to discuss?
Well met, friend.
It is good to see you again, friend. The expressionless face I must put on for my subjects...grows tiresome after a while. I am glad I have no need to wear that expression around you.
Well met.
Hail.
Speak your piece.
Hurry and speak.
As dimwitted as you are, even you must know better than to march up to the Round Table with an intention to fight. I will listen to what you have to say, but your words had better be swift.
Surely you do not plan to perform something as lowly as a sneak-attack? If your army wishes to engage in combat, then announce your intentions and do so with honour!
You have recently taken it upon yourself to place a settlement in lands rightly claimed by Britain. I demand that you cease this immediately.
Your bloodlust is like that of a Berserker-class Servant. Know that if you wish to engage in such behavior on British soil, absolutely no mercy will be shown.
Your bloodlust is like that of a Berserker-class Servant. Know that if you wish to engage in such behavior on British soil, absolutely no mercy will be shown.
The Crown seeks alliances, so that we may lead the people of Britain to further prosperity. What say you, friend? Shall we announce our alliance to the world?
The Crown seeks alliances, so that we may lead the people of Britain to further prosperity. What say you, friend? Shall we announce our alliance to the world?
Your kindness is a rare virtue among leaders. Never lose it.
Your kindness is a rare virtue among leaders. Never lose it.
Your kindness is a rare virtue among leaders. Never lose it.
Of course. Go ahead.
Of course. Go ahead.
Did you think I'd accept that offer? Do I look as dense as Shirou to you?
Is that the best offer your country can extend? I expected better.
I thank you.
I thank you.
Excellent.
Superb.
That is unfortunate.

I refuse to allow your terrible deeds to be ignored by the world any longer. I, with the power vested in me as King by the blade Caliburn, will declare to the world that you are a threat to its inhabitants the world over.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I refuse to allow your terrible deeds to be ignored by the world any longer. I, with the power vested in me as King by the blade Caliburn, will declare to the world that you are a threat to its inhabitants the world over.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
